amendment.description: To encourage the use of recycled materials in highway projects.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2837 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2837 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Snowe. (consideration: CR S11404-11405) To encourage the use of recycled materials in highway projects.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2837 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2837 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Snowe.
